title: One Pace
tagline: The Hope and Despair of the Skeleton and the Straw Hats' Counterattack!
summary: The Straw Hats regroup on the Sunny in a pitiable state, but not before Brook leaves Franky with some valuable information. In addition, they now know of the promise Brook made to a certain friend fifty years ago, someone the Straw Hats know well.
